com.hms_networks.americas.sc.logging
Class Logger

java.lang.Object
  com.hms_networks.americas.sc.logging.Logger
public class Logger
extends java.lang.Object

Logger.java

Provides an interface for managing log output using log levels.

Since:
1.0
Author:
HMS Networks, MU Americas Solution Center
